title: Interpretation of seeing someone you love repeatedly in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the repetition of a person you love in a dream. In reality, people who have a close relationship with thought are occupied with them. There is no doubt that visions and dreams explain what they are thinking about in the imagination that sees the dream. It should be noted that seeing this person in a dream can have other meanings. Therefore, during this article, an interpretation of seeing someone you love in a dream will be presented.Interpretation of seeing someone you love in a dream about a single girlIt is normal for an unmarried girl to see in her dream someone she loves and loves, because she thinks about him a lot, and the interpretation of her vision will be explained as follows: The interpreter claims Ibn Shaheen said that if a girl sees a family member in her dream, this means that she is thinking about him. Likewise, if a girl sees that the person in her life is cheating on her with another girl, this indicates that the person is cheating on her. Whereas if an unmarried woman sees someone she loves in her dream, She will marry another girl. There is no doubt that this is a symbol of the presence of many problems and fears in this girl’s life. In general, seeing a lover in a dream indicates continued thinking, desire, and love in reality. If the girl saw the person in the morning, this indicates that he is going In a straight direction. While if she discovers in her dream that she meets him at night, this indicates that there is a secret that she is hiding from others. Some interpretive scholars believe that if an unmarried girl sees someone she loves because he is far away from her, he is talking to her. It is expected that this symbolizes To her being exposed to the problems and difficulties she faces in life. Interpretation of seeing someone she loves repeatedly. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing a sad person in a dream and its effects. Interpretation of seeing someone she loves for a married woman. There is no doubt that dreams are many and varied in a married woman’s dream. It is often repeated in her dreams that she sees people she loves. The interpretation of her vision is as follows: Imam Nabulsi says that if a married woman meets a man other than her husband in her dream. Certainly this is evidence that she is not satisfied with her husband in her life with her husband. Also, if this woman sees that this person is far away from her in her dream, this indicates She is irresponsible and wants to get rid of him. But if she sees herself meeting him and sitting with him for long periods, this may indicate her desire to get rid of her husband. In addition, the dream itself is a sign that her life will be in serious trouble. Also, if a woman sees Married woman in her dream that her ex-boyfriend visits her inside her house. There is no doubt that it is not a good vision and it is not useful to her at all, as it is a sign of the eruption of disputes and problems between her and her husband. Interpretation of seeing someone you love repeatedlySee also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing a happy person in a dreamSeeing someone you love in a dream About a manIt is known that a man has close relationships with many other men, so through the strength of this relationship a man can see this person in a dream and the interpretation of his vision is as follows: When a man sees in his dream someone he loves, this is a symbol that the one he saw in his dream is Which he hates. Whereas if a man sees in his dream a woman he loves, this indicates his feelings of love and happiness towards her

title: Interpretation of seeing sexual assault in a dream, which means harassment in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child being attacked or harassed: A dream in a dream may indicate desire, but it is suppressed by the body or thinking strongly about intimacy and related matters, and the person who sees it can be harmed. It may indicate thoughts that enter the subconscious during sleep. But they It may indicate a warning of evil and danger to the monarch. Seeing a single girl rushing indicates a major injury. This is harm for anyone who wants, but wants to harm her. It indicates a return to God alone, away from evil companions who want to harm you. Seeing sexual harassment or rape by Male incest indicates family differences between you. Interpretation of rape in a dream for a married woman: When she sees a husband rushing, this indicates his affection and love for her. But she hates his style and his relationships with her, and she sometimes hates writing during an intimate relationship and the way he talks. When she sees her being rushed or harassed She is seen in a dream by someone she does not know. He wants to hurt her and harm her. He also hates her very much. When she sees harassment and rape from a man she does not know, this indicates problems, close exposure, and crises. He must be very careful and stay away from suspicions and their sources. If you witness a bloody rape, This indicates the death of a member of your family. Rape of one of her acquaintances indicates that she is in danger, and God knows best. But if he sees a rape by an unknown person, it indicates lying to the wife, and this is accompanied by exposure to many problems. Seeing the husband raping a woman other than his wife indicates that the wife is doing something forbidden, and that she is committing Betrayal. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman rushing in a dream. Seeing harassment and rape. For a pregnant woman in a dream, this indicates an easy birth for her and the joy of a healthy newborn. The vision here indicates that she stumbled during childbirth and her poor health condition. When she sees herself being harassed by someone other than her husband or By a strange man, she will give birth to a child with a beautiful nature. If that strange man's bad features and impulsiveness indicate that she will suffer some big consequences and should be careful. My husband molested another woman next to me in a dream. A wife's dream here shows insecurity next to her husband and they have family problems that could be It has a great impact on the relationship between them. For women, seeing some problems between the partner and also very bad in my opinion indicates. Interpretation of seeing rape in a dream for a man. The dream indicates excessive thinking and the desire to assault a woman with a beautiful nature, and this dreamer commits many sins and is unable to prevent or control In himself, he follows his desires. Seeing two men, one of whom was raped. On the other hand, it indicates great competition in the workplace and that one of them is winning over the other. It may indicate illness and exposure to a health crisis, and God knows best. Interpretation of a vision of attempted harassment and rape of unmarried women. This vision may indicate The goodness that is coming. If one of the relatives is exposed to it, it will provide benefit and nourishment. Sometimes it indicates a vision of rape, to spread secrets and words.

When I see someone combing my hair in a dream, this may represent happy events, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees someone combing her hair, this may lead to goodness and joy, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees in a dream someone combing her hair, this may be a sign of her liberation. Of worry and sadness, and God is Most High, Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of a dream about a hijab

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream is one of the visions whose interpretations deserve most praise and positivity, because the veil is one of the most important Islamic symbols. It is the head covering for a girl or a woman. You may also be interested in knowing the river in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars such as Sheikh Muhammad bin Sirin, but as we always emphasize that no interpretation should be inferred, we will mention it for any vision we present because this is one of the things forbidden by dream interpretation scholars and dream interpretation. It is a fatwa that concerns every person until the dream is interpreted. Interpretation of the veil in a dream Seeing the veil in a dream is a vision in which there is a lot of goodness and blessing, and it is a commendable vision. Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream If you dream of buying the veil, it may mean that you will receive good news that you will hear soon. Interpretation of seeing a black veil in a dream Seeing a black veil in a dream may indicate purity and modesty and an indication of the good reputation that the dreamer enjoys. Read also: Toilet in a dream Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream for a single woman Seeing the veil in a dream for an unmarried girl can be interpreted as a symbol of the modesty and purity that the girl enjoys - God willing. In addition, the veil in a dream is a symbol of happiness, goodness and joy that the girl will enjoy - God willing. Just like an unmarried girl who sees the veil in a dream, this can be a harbinger for her that she will soon marry a righteous man - God willing. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing the veil in a dream for a married woman Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream for a married woman Taking the veil from someone may be a sign of the blessing and goodness that the girl enjoys, and God knows best. Also, if a married woman sees Veil in a dream This may be evidence of the stability of life and happiness that this woman lives, and God knows best. Just as wearing the veil in a dream for a woman who has not worn the veil before, this may be good news for her of repentance and guidance from God - the Almighty and the Great. Read also: Penguin in a dream Seeing the veil in a dream for a man Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream for a man who sees a woman wearing the veil, this may be an indication that there is a woman who will benefit from this man in life, such as his sister, wife, or mother, and God knows best. Just as the veil in a man's dream can indicate purity and chastity, just like an unmarried young man who sees the veil in a dream, this may be good news for the upcoming wedding date - God willing -. In general, the veil in a dream indicates the happiness and joy that a person enjoys, and dreaming of a man's veil can be a sign of a travel opportunity or a new job. Read also: Washing the dead Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream Seeing the veil in a dream for a divorced woman The interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream for a divorced woman can be a symbol of humility and a modest living, as it can be an indication that she will marry a righteous man again - God willing. Taking off the veil in a divorced woman’s dream may be good news that she will marry again.

preview.html: Seeing a pigeon in a dream: There are many different shapes of pigeons, in addition to the different colors whose appearance in a dream suggests many meanings. There are also many things that result from seeing a pigeon in a dream, as it is one of the visions that convey good and evil. There are some interpretations that indicate that seeing a dove in a dream symbolizes that he is a loyal messenger or a good friend, as well as a lover or a woman in the life of a fortuneteller who keeps secrets, as it indicates a large number of children. Read more: Project in a dream Seeing a dove in a dream Read more: Seeing a promise In a dream: Also, seeing a dove in a dream by Ibn Sirin, one of the most famous imams of interpretation, indicates some different connotations, which we learn as follows: Ibn Sirin says that seeing a dove in a dream indicates the return of the traveler. It indicates that the viewer will be notified of the arrival of some various news. Also It indicates illness and death if the person suffers from any health problem. If the dreamer is afflicted with some negative things in life. He also saw doves flying in the sky, and this indicates the disappearance of worries and the end of difficulties. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is clipping the wings of a dove, this symbolizes To the imminent birth of his wife if he is pregnant. But if this is not the case, this indicates that there are some restrictions on freedom and pressures that the viewer is experiencing. Read more: Interpretation of a plane crash in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a dove in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqWe also explain here the interpretation of this vision by Imam Al-Sadiq, which indicates some different interpretations and contents, then we mention some of them, which are as follows: Imam Al-Sadiq says that seeing a dove in a dream indicates that a person has lost his freedom. This, either by some or because of his imprisonment, will soon gain freedom. Seeing A dove in a dream indicates the repayment of many debts. If an unmarried young man dreams of seeing a beautiful dove, then this vision indicates an imminent marriage. Seeing a lot of doves in the house indicates to the dreamer abundant money, which he collects without difficulty and exhaustion. The rays of the doves are very entertaining and eliminate Unpleasant visions of Imam Al-Sadiq. Read more: A piano in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream for a single woman. Also, seeing a dove in a dream for a single woman is one of the dreams that carries many different connotations. Here we learn about these associations, which are as follows: If you see a dove in a dream for a single woman Married, this means that it is a harbinger of the approaching marriage. It indicates an association with a good person and a good conduct. It also indicates that there are some pleasant changes in the girl’s life. If an unmarried girl sees a lot of pigeons in the house, this indicates her high status in the family. The vision A dove in a dream for a single girl indicates many good and desirable things. If an unmarried girl sees scenes of torture in the bathroom in a dream, this means that she is exposed to a lot of psychological pressures that she is going through. If you see a white dove in an unmarried woman’s dream, this means a promotion You'll get it at Uncle's

And pregnant women, it is one of the dreams that many people have in one dream, and it is a dream that carries meanings of joy and pleasure. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bride in a dream for a single woman. Interpretations of seeing a bride in a dream vary according to the individual’s social status, which carries meanings of imminent goodness. Among the interpretations of seeing the bride in a dream for a single woman are the following: Seeing the bride wearing a beautiful white wedding dress in a dream is evidence of her engagement and marriage soon. Seeing the bride and the accompanying dancing, fun, and drumming means that her fears and sorrows will increase and she will go through a difficult time. As a bride and groom, you know her in happy moments with him, showing happiness and pleasure. Seeing an unmarried girl as a bride in a dream is evidence that she will achieve what she wants and aspires to. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bride in a dream for a married woman. There are many interpretations of seeing a bride in a dream for a married woman, according to the interpretations provided by the most famous interpreters. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a bride in a dream for a married woman is as follows: Seeing her as a bride in a dream is evidence that she will change her place of residence and move to another place of residence. Seeing a bride wearing a beautiful white wedding dress in a married woman’s dream means that she will become pregnant soon. Whoever sees herself as a bride And being happy in a dream is evidence of an increase in livelihood and the blessing of her home and children. What proves that he is a loving, caring and kind person. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bride in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pregnant woman’s bride in a dream is one of the interpretations that differs from other social situations, and one of the most famous interpretations of seeing a bride in a dream. A dream for a pregnant woman includes: Evidence that she will give birth to a beautiful female. Dreaming that she is a bride and married her husband in the dream is evidence that she will give birth to a male. Evidence of good offspring. If she sees that she is wearing a torn dress, this indicates serious problems that she will face during childbirth. Interpretation The view of the bride by Ibn Sirin Imam Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most famous dream interpreters in the Arab world according to Islamic standards, and among the interpretations of Ibn Sirin who sees the bride in a dream are the following: Seeing the bride in a dream is not a good thing. If a pregnant woman sees that she is wearing a white wedding dress, this indicates That she will give birth and that she will be happy with the child. Seeing the bride in a dream means that the dreamer has a big problem and he hates her or hates someone close to him. Seeing the bride without dancing, singing, and having fun in a dream is evidence of changing the fortuneteller’s life for the better and improving his life in reality. title: Interpretation of a dream about the forest in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the forest in a dream, which is considered one of the unpleasant things that can happen in reality, and everyone is afraid of the forest because it is lonely, but when a person sees it in a dream and you may be interested in knowing someone who knows that he is sick in a dream, he begins to worry and begins to wonder what it means This dream, and due to the large number of questions, there are a large number of different interpretations of this dream formulated by many scholars.Interpretation of seeing the forest in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the forest in a dream for a married womanThe married woman fears this dream very much. Among the interpretations of this dream are the following: When a married woman sees that there A dark forest in a dream, and she is also afraid while in it, this indicates that she feels very lonely in this life. This dream may indicate that this woman feels safe when she sees tree leaves. If this woman sees a lot of monkeys in the forest, this indicates that around her Many are hypocrites, and God knows best. If this woman sees reptiles in the forest, this indicates that she is surrounded by a large number of haters, and God knows best. See also: The project in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the forest in a dream for a single woman. This dream indicates many different things that could happen to this woman. Girl soon. Among the interpretations related to it are the following: If she sees that there is a large forest but it does not contain trees, this indicates that many good and enjoyable things will happen to her. When she sees that she is walking in the forest, this indicates that all the problems in her life are seeking to leave her life soon, by God. I know. See also: Symbols that indicate problems. Interpretation of seeing the forest in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman fears for herself to a great extent, and this dream has many interpretations of her own, and among these interpretations are the following: When you see her walking in the forest, this indicates that she will give birth soon, as it indicates It also indicates that this birth will be easy. If she sees that there is a very black forest, this indicates that she will face a little difficulty in the birth process. And if the pregnant woman sees that she is hunting a rabbit, this indicates that she is pregnant with a boy, and God knows best. See also: Insulting religion in a dream. Interpretation Seeing the forest in a man’s dreamThis dream explains a large number of different interpretations that a person can see in a dream, and among these interpretations are the following: In general, this dream shows that this person is brave and is not afraid of anything and can be relied upon in any matter. When he sees If a person sees that there are a group of monkeys in the forest, this indicates that there are many hypocrites around him, and God knows best. If this man sees that there are a large number of reptiles around him in the forest, this indicates that there are many haters in his life. See also: Library in a dream, interpretation of seeing the forest In a dream, this dream refers to a large number of different things that a person sees in his life, and among the interpretations of this dream are the following: When a person sees that there is a wolf in the forest, this indicates that he is an intelligent person and can manage his affairs to an extent.

title: Interpretation of a dream about retreating in a dream and vomiting in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the return of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams. Returning to the dream is evidence of the repentance that the dreamer wants. The dream of vomiting indicates a distance from sins and committing sins. Rewinding indicates approaching God, righteousness, and walking on the path of guidance. Dreaming of vomiting in a dream and its taste is not good, this indicates sincere repentance and abandonment of All bad habits. Vomiting blood in a dream is evidence of money and the return of the absent person. Vomiting in a dream with the expulsion of stomach intestines is a sign of unpleasant things. Interpretation of a dream of wrapping in a dream by Al-Nabulsi will explain in detail the interpretation of a dream of vomiting as interpreted by Al-Nabulsi, as vomiting milk is a sign of repentance A dream of vomiting pearls is evidence of lack of religion and distance from God Almighty. If anyone sees a dream about wrapping food after swallowing a pearl, this indicates that he has received a long-awaited gift. Seeing him eating vomit after it has subsided indicates the recovery of some things that were lost. A dream of vomiting while fasting indicates To the existence of a debt that must be paid quickly. A person’s dream of regurgitation with an unpleasant taste indicates that he is an unjust person and has caused injustice to many people. Going backwards in a dream because of wine shows that he has a lot of money, but he does not spend it because of his extreme stinginess. Interpretation of a dream of regurgitation (vomiting ) For a single woman, the interpretation of a dream about returning a girl is single. It indicates the safety in which she will be after this vision. Vomiting indicates getting rid of the problems and fears that she suffers from. Imam Al-Sadiq confirmed that a dream about vomiting or vomiting for a girl in a dream is evidence of the happiness she will be in. A girl’s dream shows bad vomiting That she changed her financial life for the better and gets a lot of money. What is the interpretation of a dream about draping for a married woman? If a married woman sees the return of blood, this indicates that she will get a lot of money. Vomiting blood in a dream indicates a male child that she will give birth to soon. Vomiting blood in a dream It indicates repentance and this woman’s distance from sins and transgressions. Seeing vomiting also indicates distance from forbidden money. A dream of vomiting blood is a good dream for this woman. Vomiting easily indicates sincere repentance. Interpretation of a dream about returning in a dream (vomiting) for a pregnant woman. A dream about vomiting indicates for a pregnant woman To the birth of a healthy, healthy child without diseases. Seeing a lot of vomiting means that death and death are near. Resetting the color black in a dream indicates fears, sorrows, and major problems that will befall him. Vomiting in a dream indicates difficulty in childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about regressing in a dream for a man. A man’s dream of vomiting Severe is evidence of the death of a relative. If the man is sick, because a dream of vomiting indicates death from illness. A man’s vomiting indicates problems and obstacles that he is going through. Strong vomiting in a dream indicates unpleasant things. Interpretation of a dream about vomiting in a child in detail. A dream about black vomiting in a child is evidence of Repent and return to God Almighty. Returning the child’s blood means illicit money. Intestinal reflux indicates the death of one of the dreamer’s children. Rewinding indicates sins and sins committed by the dreamer. A man’s dream that he vomits and nothing comes out is evidence of death and illness. Interpretation of a dream about rewinding

title: Interpretation of the exam for a non-student in a Nabulsi dream

preview.html: We met, dear reader, the interpretation of seeing exams in a dream for a non-student according to Al-Nabulsi. Through our article today from the encyclopedia, many people see this vision in a dream and do not know what its interpretation is and whether it brings with it good or evil. Scientists and jurists have proposed many different interpretations depending on the situation they see. One takes exams, and of course the interpretation varies according to the nature of the person, whether he is male or female, and also varies according to the person’s social status. A person if he is single, married and if the woman is single, married or pregnant. If a person sees an exam in a dream and wakes up from his sleep, then here he can link this matter with success and study, but if he finishes his education, here he will wonder what is the cause of the stress and tension that followed it. In the dream, which is similar to what he felt while he was in the exam, the dream may have the meaning of a certain experience that he is passing, and he wants to achieve an achievement or success. The topic may have other signs and repercussions, so we will discuss what Al-Nabulsi believes about attending exams in a dream for a person who has finished his studies and not for a student In a school or university, just follow us. Interpretation of the exam for a non-student in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that attending an exam in a dream for someone who is not a student and does not study its meaning exposes him to life’s trials and he may succeed or fail in them. If a married man sees that he feels comfortable and reassured when he takes the exam, this is a vision Good and its meaning is that he will soon overcome all the annoying things and things that made him feel uncomfortable and led to psychological pressure. When a married man sees an exam board in his dream, it means that he feels anxious and stressed about something, with his situation unstable. If the dreamer passes the exam, It shows his patience and endurance in times of hardship. When the dreamer sees that he is taking an exam and cannot solve his questions, this is an unpleasant vision and means that the dreamer will be exposed to a calamity or something bad, and it may indicate the need to return to God and to get closer to God.. Interpretation of seeing exams in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi There is There is a consensus between the scholar Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin regarding seeing the test in a dream, and these visions are as follows: If the dreamer passes the test and answers all the questions and feels happy, then this is evidence that he passed the tests with merit and excellence and got rid of the difficulties. If the dreamer was not able to solve Test Questions During the dream, it means that his relationship with God Almighty is weak, so he should approach Him again and worship Him more, and it may also be a sign of harm and misery. It is a misfortune for the dreamer, or he will be exposed to many troubles. If the fortuneteller feels comfortable on the exam board, this indicates that he has gotten rid of all the difficult matters that led to discomfort and psychological pressure. When the dreamer sees that he passed the test and passed it and was able to obtain a graduation certificate, this means That the person will achieve his ambitions and goals that he has been searching for for a long time. Meaning of test paper in a dream When the dreamer sees that he is cheating on a test, this means that he does not

title: Interpretation of seeing the sound of a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of this vision depends on detailed knowledge of the details and facts of the vision, just as it depends on knowledge of the social status of the viewer, whether she is married or divorced. As for the woman, she is married, single, pregnant, or divorced, and this is what we will learn in today’s dream website topic. Seeing the sound of a snake in a dream for a son Sirin, the scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing a snake in a dream symbolizes both good and evil, according to the details of the vision. He said that a man who dreams that his wife gives birth to a snake in a dream is a sign that she will give birth to a disabled son. The vision also indicates the approaching stage full of difficulties and problems. As for someone who dreams that a snake is sitting next to him in a dream and he hears its sound and does not harm him, this indicates that there is a person close to him in reality who has unpleasant and hateful feelings towards him. And when someone dreams of being bitten by a snake in a dream, but he quickly gets rid of this pain, this is a sign of enhanced strength. Almighty God, for His constant remembrance of God. Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing a snake in a dream symbolizes bad luck and bad news. The meaning of dreaming about the sound of a snake in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a snake in a dream indicates the enemy. An unmarried girl who sees a snake in a dream and hears its voice indicates the presence of a strong force, and for her a cheater is a person who She loves him and wants to marry him, and she must be careful and wait to choose her life partner. The vision also means that there are difficulties and crises that the visionary will go through. When an unmarried woman dreams that a snake has attacked her sanctuary, in the dream there is strong evidence that he is committing disobedience and sins. Seeing the sound of a snake in a dream for a married woman is a vision A snake in a dream for a married woman is a sign of difficulties in married life. Anyone who sees that she has been bitten by a snake in a dream indicates the great suffering she suffers from her mother-in-law or her husband’s sisters. As for whoever was able to escape from the snake in the dream, it symbolizes: overcoming the vision of the family problems she is going through. With her husband. A dream about the sound of a snake in a dream by Sheikh Al-Nabulsi. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi said, Hearing the sound of a snake in a dream of a girl who has never been married indicates that she hears sweet words from a young man in her life. The vision may indicate that the fortuneteller is very ill. The meaning of seeing the sound of a snake in a dream for a young man: A young man who Dreaming of the sound of a snake in his dream is a sign that the girl. The person she loves is disreputable and unfit for marriage. And who sees it? Run away from the snake. In the dream, it means that he is strong and able to get out of his crises. Add the dream you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment below the article and we will respond. And we explain it.
